Wide Mouth Containers (Jar)

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]At WASHUN Machinery, We offer the two stage stretch blow molding equipments for wide openings preforms. Our machine is built for the neck finishes up to 140mm and even bigger depends on the customers needs. Mega’s wide mouth option can be added to our entire standard automatic reheat stretch blow molding machine.

The economic manual machine MG-Jar700 is built for the small bottle outputs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4035″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

  • Bottle Samples

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Applications
Sauces, preserves, powders & granules, cereals, cosmetics…
Advantages
Less weight compare to the glass jar None frangibility
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4036″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Remark

[vc_column_text]WASHUN Provides the automatic wide mouth preform handling system for our reheat stretch blow molding machines.

WASHUN Machinery, the Professional blow molding equipments supplier in China.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Related Blow Molding Machines:

[vc_column_text]– MG-SS Stretch Blow Molding Machine
– MG-E Stretch blow molding machine
– MG-JAR700[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
